data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the Neotropical spider genus Xiruana Brescovit 1997 (Araneae: Anyphaenidae, Anyphaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Luiz Fernando M., Brescovit, Antonio D. (2015): A taxonomic revision of the Neotropical spider genus Xiruana Brescovit 1997 (Araneae: Anyphaenidae, Anyphaeninae). Zootaxa 3980 (2): 201-229, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3980.2.3
